promptForName: Generate a unique, original, creative, single-word name for a chibi cute basic bull normal-type pokemon with opal hooves. It can be found in village-like environments. Do not use the words pokemon, normal or bull. Ony answer with the generated name
promptForDescription: Generate a short, original, creative Pokedex description for Villabuhorn, a a chibi cute basic bull normal-type pokemon. It can be found in village-like environments It has the following abilities: Pluck, Exact Revenge. Be creative about its day-to-day life. Do not use the words "bull", "normal" or "Villabuhorn". Use a maximum of 150 characters. Only answer with the generated description.
promptForVisual: mdjrny-v4 style portrait of normal-type pokemon, bull-like, basic, digital art, sugimori, chibi, centered, full body, soft ambient light
generatedDescription: Villabuhorn, the Village Guardian Pokémon. This tiny, endearing bovine gathers food for its herd with Pluck and fiercely avenges threats with Exact Revenge.
